pullrequest.title: Add simple test to ensure sandisland / wamv spawns

content.raw:
I got the following error while running the test:

    Scanning dependencies of target _run_tests_robotx_gazebo_rostest_test_sandisland.test
    -- run_tests.py: execute commands
      /opt/ros/kinetic/share/rostest/cmake/../../../bin/rostest --pkgdir=/home/developer/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/robotx_gazebo --package=robotx_gazebo --results-filename test_sandisland.xml --results-base-dir /home/developer/vmrc_ws/build/test_results /home/developer/vmrc_ws/src/vmrc/robotx_gazebo/test/sandisland.test 
    ... logging to /home/developer/.ros/log/rostest-f0b9cad11f05-25902.log
    [ROSUNIT] Outputting test results to /home/developer/vmrc_ws/build/test_results/robotx_gazebo/rostest-test_sandisland.xml
    [Testcase: testsandisland_test] ... FAILURE!
    FAILURE: Test node [robotx_gazebo/sandisland_test] does not exist or is not executable
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/unittest/case.py", line 329, in run
        testMethod()
      File "/opt/ros/kinetic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rostest/runner.py", line 93, in fn
        self.fail(message)
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/unittest/case.py", line 410, in fail
        raise self.failureException(msg)
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    [ROSTEST]-----------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    [testsandisland_test][failed]
    
    SUMMARY
     * RESULT: FAIL
     * TESTS: 0
     * ERRORS: 0
     * FAILURES: 1
    
    ERROR: The following tests failed to run:
     * testsandisland_test

‌
